title: A speech to the people, or, A briefe and reall discovery of the unhappy estate of these most distracted times with a necessary caution to all good subjects / vvritten by T. I. gent. ...
author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?
notes: Attributed to Thomas Jordan.  Cf. NUC-pre 1956.
